      • getLastModifiedType

        public int getLastModifiedType()
        Get the event occured , happened to the last file (Create/Delete e.t.c) , for a list of possible values , @see ModifiedType

        Note:you call this method , after you call the getLastModifiedFile()

        Note:this method must always called equally times as getLastModifiedFile()

        Returns:
        the last event , as a integer bitmask , of values exist in ModifiedType
